unnormalised: ## New Wheels Alert! What's Hot on the Indian Roads?
normalised: ## New Wheels Alert! What's Hot on the Indian Roads?

unnormalised: Namaste, petrolheads! It's that time again – the Indian automotive market is buzzing with new vehicle launches, and your friendly neighborhood auto blogger is here to give you the lowdown. Forget your chai break for a minute, because this is exciting!
normalised: Namaste, petrolheads! It's that time again – the Indian automotive market is buzzing with new vehicle launches, and your friendly neighborhood auto blogger is here to give you the lowdown. Forget your chai break for a minute, because this is exciting!

unnormalised: First up, Tata Motors just dropped a bomb with their updated Nexon EV. Dr. Sharma from IIT Delhi reckons the improved battery tech gives it a real edge. We’re talking a claimed range bump of almost 450 km! Early reviews are praising the refreshed design too. Looks like Mahindra needs to up their game to compete.
normalised: First up, Tata Motors just dropped a bomb with their updated Nexon E V. Doctor Sharma from I I T Delhi reckons the improved battery tech gives it a real edge. We’re talking a claimed range bump of almost four hundred and fifty kilometer! Early reviews are praising the refreshed design too. Looks like Mahindra needs to up their game to compete.

unnormalised: Then, Maruti Suzuki launched a special edition of the Baleno, calling it the "Baleno Rockstar Edition" – because why not? It's got some jazzy new colors and apparently a sound system that'll make you feel like you're at a Honey Singh concert. Rs. 7.5 lakhs ex-showroom is the ballpark figure.
normalised: Then, Maruti Suzuki launched a special edition of the Baleno, calling it the "Baleno Rockstar Edition" – because why not? It's got some jazzy new colors and apparently a sound system that'll make you feel like you're at a Honey Singh concert. Rupee seven point five lakhs ex-showroom is the ballpark figure.

unnormalised: Don't forget the luxury segment! BMW unveiled their new 7 Series in Mumbai last week. Talk about a head-turner! This beast comes packed with all the bells and whistles you can imagine, including a rear seat entertainment system that's bigger than my first apartment (which, admittedly, was only 200 sq ft). We’re talking serious Ambani vibes here.
normalised: Don't forget the luxury segment! B M W unveiled their new seven Series in Mumbai last week. Talk about a head-turner! This beast comes packed with all the bells and whistles you can imagine, including a rear seat entertainment system that's bigger than my first apartment (which, admittedly, was only two hundred square feet). We’re talking serious Ambani vibes here.

unnormalised: The two-wheeler segment isn't being left out either. Hero MotoCorp is teasing a new adventure bike, rumored to be called the XPulse 400. They showed off a concept at the Auto Expo in Greater Noida, and everyone’s been drooling ever since. Fingers crossed it's as good as it looks!
normalised: The two-wheeler segment isn't being left out either. Hero MotoCorp is teasing a new adventure bike, rumored to be called the X Pulse four hundred. They showed off a concept at the Auto Expo in Greater Noida, and everyone’s been drooling ever since. Fingers crossed it's as good as it looks!

unnormalised: So, there you have it – a quick peek at the latest and greatest rolling out onto Indian roads. Keep your eyes peeled, your wallets ready, and happy driving! Don't forget to honk if you see me!
normalised: So, there you have it – a quick peek at the latest and greatest rolling out onto Indian roads. Keep your eyes peeled, your wallets ready, and happy driving! Don't forget to honk if you see me!
